div.p: This value set expansion contains 4 concepts.

td.a: No dengue doses from primary series were administered-115

tr.td: No dengue doses from primary series were administered

td.a: First dengue dose from the primary series was administered-115

tr.td: First dengue dose from the primary series was administered

td.a: Second dengue dose from the primary series was administered-115

tr.td: Second dengue dose from the primary series was administered

td.a: Third dengue dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-93

tr.td: Third dengue dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SDengue3DosesWithPreVaccinationScreening for IMMZ.D18.S.Dengue schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a dengue vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: CYD-TDV (Dengvaxia), 3-dose schedule
